rooms.title: Entrance To An Ant Hill
rooms.description: You are at the entrance of what seems to be a huge ant hill. Disturbing sounds are coming from the hole.

rooms.title: A Dark Tunnel
rooms.description: There are tunnels leading north and east. West is the entrance of this place.

rooms.title: A Winding Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel here is bending from west to south.

rooms.title: A Room In The Tunnel
rooms.description: This part of the tunnel is lot bigger and seems more like a room. What are they doing in here?

rooms.title: Splitting Tunnels
rooms.description: The tunnel splits up in many directions, all looking dark.

rooms.title: A Windy Tunnel
rooms.description: You can feel a draft following the tunnel east and west.

rooms.title: A Long Curve
rooms.description: You are in a long curved part of the tunnel. You can go north to follow the curve or east to make your way back to safety.

rooms.title: A Long Curve
rooms.description: You are in a long curved part of the tunnel. In the east you see a faint light.

rooms.title: A Light In The Tunnel
rooms.description: This part of the tunnel is lit up, but the light is mostly coming from down below. You have the feeling that might be the end of the tunnel.

rooms.title: Kerrigan's Lair
rooms.description: This is where Kerrigan hangs out when she's not mind controlling things.

rooms.title: A Dead End
rooms.description: You're at a dead end. As long as you're not dead yourself you can always go back south.

rooms.title: A Deep Hole
rooms.description: You are in a deep hole. This is probably where the little zerglings sleep at night.

rooms.title: A Random Room
rooms.description: It's not really clear what this room is used for. In the corner something is scribbled on the wall: goo.gl/RFlt2A
